title: NLFS: <Traded> 1899 M101-1 Sporting News NAP LAJOIE - rookie
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: NLFS: <Traded> 1899 M101-1 Sporting News NAP LAJOIE - rookie
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is the following 1899 M101-1 Sporting News Supplement of Nap Lajoie.  

Most would classify this as Lajoie's "rookie" issue.  The supplement has been graded as BGS 1.5 (Fair) by the strict graders at Beckett.  I'd be happy to send better pictures of the front and back if desired, but don't be surprised if this sells before I get the chance.  A BVG Auth example sold for $2,700 in a recent Love of the Game Auction offering:

[url]https://loveofthegameauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=16291[/url]

I'm asking only TRADED for this example.

First to email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] with an "I'll take it!" will be the proud new owner.  Paypal f/f preferred.


[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/hofrookies1/websize/1899%20Lajoie.jpg[/IMG]

Derek-
That is a superb example of a really tough issue!  I certainly think these are undervalued!
Good luck with the sale
Eric

Thanks Eric!  I couldn't agree more!

Attached are some pictures I took of the card in the holder last night.  Two light folds/creases to the left and right of Nap's face are what kept the technical grade down.  They are very hard to see unless up close or in just the "right" light.

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/6DCC360C-53DD-44FE-8002-C977317138F81.jpeg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/5DF8FC1E-D073-4931-999B-D41B601911821.jpeg[/IMG]
Final price reduction.  Then back to the vault.
